text: owun sambandhawa winaya kriyathmaka kirime baladhariya wanne agawinisuruwaraya pramukha adhikarana sewa komishan sabhawayi.durakathana sanwada siddhiyata nama gawuna mahadhikarana winisuruwaraya sambandhawa adhikarana sewa komishan sabhawa me wana wita janadhipathiwarayage upades matha parikshanayak aarambha kota thibe .ema parikshanaya thawamath aarambhaka awadhiye pawathi .ese thibiya di mahadhikarana winisuruwaraya athadanguwata ganimata mema niyojya solisitar jenaralwaraya uthsaha karanne pahadiliwama jiniwa manawa himikam komishan sabhawe di rajaya asiruwata path kirime aramunin bawa nithipathi departhamenthuwe jyeshta prakashakayek apa samaga pawasiya.‚Äù

kantha sanwardhanaya wadi kirima saha diwayina pura pihiti siyalu pasalwala shishyabhata khanda aarambha kirima da siduweyi.giya wasare sita mese sisuwiyan bandawa ganna pramanaya wadi kirimata gath thiranaya matha ema palath balika balaani pihituwi ma da siduwiya.demapiyanta wada idiriyen yana daru parapurak athikara nayakathwaya darime puhunuwa labadi owun jathyantharayata sambandha kirima pasal daruwan wishala pramanayak shishya bhata balakayata bandawagena puhunuwa labadima aramunu weyi.mita perada pasalwalin sisu sisuwiyan thora shishya bhata balaka puhunuwa laba dunna da aarakshaka amathyanshaya owun wenuwen metharam wishala mudalak wenkirimath saha ema wadapiliwela jathyantharaya dakwa genayamath prawanathawayak wuye natha.me wanawita jathyanthara ratawal 8kata pamana puhunuwa sandaha sisu sisuwiyan yawena athara labana wasare sita ratawal 16kata yawena athara ese yawana pramanaya warakata ekasiya panahata wadi pramanayak dakwa da wadikara thibe.mese jathyanthara puhunu sandaha yawana sisu sisuwiyange wiyadam sampurnayenma rajayen darana athara wides ratawala rajya nayakayan munagasima athulu wiwidha waraprasada rasak mema shishya bhata balaka sisu sisuwiyanta himiweyi.
